articles.author: J.J. Post
articles.title: Meet the 1894 Yale Bulldogs, the first college football team to go 16-0 - ESPN
articles.description: Indiana could complete a 16-0 season with a national championship win over Miami on Monday night. But it won't be the first team to accomplish the feat.
articles.content: On Monday, Indiana will look to cap off a dominant storybook season in the national championship game, where a title game win will give the Hoosiers a 16-0 record that's without parallel in the moder… [+15274 chars]
